casebody.data:
David KAHN, Bankrupt-Appellant, v. Alexander SCHAFFER, Objecting Creditor-Appellee. George B. SCHATZ, Bankrupt-Appellant, v. Alexander SCHAFFER, Objecting Creditor-Appellee. No. 238, Docket 28998. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 9, 1964. Decided Dec. 9, 1964. Edward L. Dubroff, Brooklyn, N. Y., for bankrupt-appellant David Kahn. Nathanial S. Rudes, Lynbrook, N. Y., for bankrupt-appellant George B. Schatz. I. Robert Bassin, Jamaica, N. Y., for objecting creditor-appellee.

Before WATERMAN, MOORE and KAUFMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The order below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Rayfiel, reported at 226 F.Supp. 507.
